api_translation_text:
Are you sure you want to translate [NUMBER] String(s) via Translator API?
Depending on the Translator API this can raise unexpected costs.
changed_string_text: String was modified. Do you want to save it before switching to another string?
filter_no_translation_required: Show Strings that require no Translation
filter_translation_required: Show Strings that require a Translation
help_text: Below is an overview of the various Status a String can have:
no_translation_required_status: String does not require a Translation
reset_translation_text: Are you sure, you want to reset selected Strings to their Original? This cannot be undone!
shortcut_hint:
Press F1 (Translation complete), F2 (Translation incomplete/Work in Progress) or F3 (No translation required)
to finalize the string and go to the next one.
show_help: Show Help about String Status Colors
